import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar'; import MailList from '../../components/mailList/MailList'; import Footer from '../../components/footer/Footer'; import './booking.css' const Booking = () => { const location = useLocation(); const [date, setDate] = useState(location.state.date); const [user, setUser] = useState(location.state.user); const [hotel, setHotel] = useState(location.state.hotel); const [options, setOptions] = useState(location.state.options); const [rooms, setRooms] = useState([]); const [checked, setChecked] = useState(false); const [roomNumber, setRoomNumber] = useState(0); console.log(rooms.filter(room => room.roomNumbers.includes(roomNumber))); console.log(options); useEffect(() => { const roomId = { id: hotel.rooms, options: options } const post = () => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/room', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(roomId), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setRooms(data); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } post(); }, []) const handleChange = (e) => { let isChecked = e.target.checked; let roomNumber = e.target.value; setChecked(isChecked); setRoomNumber(roomNumber); } return (

) }; export default Booking;
